subject: Amazon Order Not Received
description_text:
Hello,
 

 
I placed an order for PRO X U-P3-H3-1-1 (Pro X Ultra with Baseplate) and it was "delivered" through UPS tracking #1ZJ201H40303678364. However, I only received a slim brown box containing the Baseplate, heel plate and LED strip (no pedal hardware). I checked with Amazon and they said to get in touch with UPS. I called UPS and they told me that the item is correctly delivered and that there was only 1 box in the shipment. Their recommendation was to check with the shipper so I am writing today to see if I can still expect the pedals or if I should place another order and seek a refund from Amazon? Please advise, thank you!
 

 
Order summary
 
Order placed
 
December 3, 2025
 
Order #
 
113-7566553-5041835
 

 
UPS Tracking
 
1ZJ201H40303678364
 

 
Best regards,
 
Jose Pacheco
 
josepacheco400@gmail.com

conversations.body_text: Hi josepacheco400,   Your order 113-7566553-5041835  from SIMSONN was sent out in 2 packages. The tracking number for the PRO X Ultra Pedals is 886910295097  (ships from US warehouse, the shipping carrier is FedEx, you can track it via https://www.fedex.com/fedextrack ),
